extendedInfo.description: Worried about others going through your picture gallery? Not anymore. With HIDE MY PHOTOS you become WORRY-LESS!This is a DISGUISED PHOTO VAULT.*** This is Lite version. It hides only 10 photos. For unlimited use, purchase Pro version from market***Q. What is the app all about?A. With this app, you can safely hide such snaps. No one can see those photos but you. Even better, no one will come to know that you have installed an app like this, because it's disguised.Q. How is it disguised? How to access the app?A. The app is installed as "Manager". It's a plain white screen (like torch). Now tap 4 times on the screen to get into app.Q. How to hide pictures? A. Open gallery. Select the images. Click Share and then Manager. Rest is self explanatory.Q. Can I arrange the hidden photos in different folders?A. Absolutely. You can even create, rename, delete folders and photos from the app itself. Let us know if you run into any trouble, we respond quickly.
